body_html: It seems that the two versions do not mix very well due to different ways of dealing with MKL libraries. One possible way is for us to revive the old FindMKL.cmake and see how we can consolidate the differences. This will block #7163 as well.

body: It seems that the two versions do not mix very well due to different ways of dealing with MKL libraries. One possible way is for us to revive the old FindMKL.cmake and see how we can consolidate the differences. This will block #7163  as well.
